name: Night Shuriken
description:
Trapped in a darkened warehouse, mysterious figures start to come alive. Having nothing else to use but shurikens, you're left to fend for yourself.

Click here to play on browser (Chrome recommended).

Attribution

Flesh sound modified from magnuswaker on freesound.org
First person camera code from Godot Asset Library
Screen shake code from kidscancode.org
